UpdateManifest.ChangeLog: - First release of Molflow 2.7 for Linux
- Fixed factor of 1E8 discrepancy in pressure evolution plotter
- Major under the hood changes, porting to SDL2 framework - Fixing leaks at teleports - Restored "Save to TXT" function for profiles - Restored "Coord" facet coordinates button

Interface: - Non planar facets higlighted with purple outline - Number input boxes catch Enter/ESC Bugfix: - Strictly enforcing right-hand facet rotation (prevents wrong normal direction on concave facets) - Textures no longer turn white on window resize - Time-dependent parameters work again - Fixed config file and xml file save format (gas mass and half-life) - Select sticking and select transparent commands select time-dependent parametered facets as well Misc: - Upgraded underlying event manager from SDL 1.2 to SDL2, please report new bugs - Subprocesses now have Idle (lowest possible) priority
Feature: - Subprocesses can be restarted or changed without resetting simulation Bugfix: - GEO files load again - Incident angle maps work again

Feature: - Histograms introduced (number of bounces / flight distance / flight time before absorption) - Pressure evolution plotter doesn't need profiles anymore, can plot any facet (facet hits are now time-dependent) - You can create facets that belong to every structure (type "all" to structure number) - Optimized ray tracing is 10% faster Interface: - "Select facet by number" command: select facets by range and/or lists - Restored "Coord" button for facet coordinates Bugfix: - Fixed importing desoprtion from latest version SYN files - Fixed a memory leak on deleting facets with angle maps Other: - Significant under-the-hood changes, Molflow now uses several C++17 features, please report if you find bugs
- Fixed a memory management error causing crash on geometry change - Added About/License info
Bugfix - Fixed hard visibility (with Texture view on) of selected facets in 2.6.67 - Fixed a crash when trying to delete non-existent structure

Feature - Support for right-handed coordinate system (change in Global Settings) Interface - Facet coordinates now in Facet menu (or shortcut CTRL+T) to make space for coming histogram tool Bugfix - Fixed a collapse bug creating facets with extra (inner) edges

Feature - Particle logger tool (record and export all hits on a facet) - Screenshot tool - 'Create difference' can now create multiple holes in the same facet Interface - More verbose status labels in bottom of screen Bugfix - Fixed an auto-updater crash when the update file couldn't be written locally - Loading SYN files works again
Feature - Tangential velocity profiles
Bugfix - Collapse function works again - Fixed particle trajectories shown going through walls - Fixed a bug where facets remained selected in the hit list after collapse

Feature: - Support for facets belonging to all structures at once Bugfix: - Support for compressing files with hundreds of regions - Apply button becomes active on Spectrum recording toggle - Critical energy calculation more precise - Fixed crash when pressing Cancel at Load region to dialog
- Fixed a memory management error causing crash on geometry change - Added About/License info
Bugfix - Fixed hard visibility (with Texture view on) of selected facets in 2.6.67 - Fixed a crash when trying to delete non-existent structure

Feature - All profiles and spectra count incident and absorbed flux/power/hits separately - Added Particle Logger tool (Tools menu) - Screenshot tool (CTRL+R) - Starting structure changeable for each region - SYN file advanced to version 10, earlier versions won't open files written with this version Interface - Support for right-handed coordinate system (change in Global Settings) - Region editor: can copy beam settings from an other region Bugfix - Collapse bug fix - Removed rough surface reflection angle limit (discrete lines in the reflection pattern) - Checking for filename conflicts before saving to a syn7z file - Fixed enabled/disabled controls in region editor - Fixed "invalid autocorrelation length" message - BXY file empty lines are skipped (previously gave error) - Fixed inserting SYN file - param file handle released if loading fails - App updater can handle file write errors (crashed before)
Feature - For integrity, spectrum and profiles are only recorded for the absorbed part of flux Bugfix - Collapse function works again - Spectrums, profiles work again - Right-click menus work again
Bugfix - Wrong relaunch angle at teleport - Fixed not saving "shade lines" and "show teleports" viewer settings
